definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: When shocked, she opens her mouth as she knits her brows.
sentences.chinese: 当她震惊的时候，她会张开嘴巴，同时皱起眉头。

sentences.english: The gentle wind, blowing open your petty brow tight, so fly back all the worry.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻的风，吹开你紧琐的眉头，让所有的愁向后飞去。

sentences.english: Is simultaneous, in the outside, final officer rain poem waited a human to likewise furrow up eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 同时的，在外面，上官雨诗等人也皱起了眉头。

sentences.english: Thomas made a little grimace, perhaps he thought the wine was sour.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯微微皱起眉头可能是他认为酒发酸了。

sentences.english: He frowns upon things like that .
sentences.chinese: 他对那样的事情是皱眉头的。

sentences.english: Rebete, frowning at a puddle on a sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 他对着人行道上的一摊“水”直皱眉头。

sentences.english: The person is always frowning in the "before" picture.
sentences.chinese: 看到减肥前的照片，人们总是皱起眉头。

sentences.english: As he came close and lit the match, his eyes inadvertently locked with line.
sentences.chinese: 在他靠近并递过火柴时，他的眉头不经意的皱了皱。

sentences.english: Never frow even when you are sad because you never know who is falling in love with you smile.
sentences.chinese: 永远不要皱着眉头，因为你不知道谁会爱上你的笑容。

sentences.english: When the Emperor saw me he frowned, and said to me, "What is thy name?
sentences.chinese: 皇帝望见我，便蹙起眉头对我说，“你姓甚名谁？

sentences.english: No, I want to pluck eyebrows and do some makeup.
sentences.chinese: 没有，我想拔掉眉头，化点妆。

sentences.english: The drowsy browser knits its brows to browbeat the frowzy crow.
sentences.chinese: 昏昏欲睡的吃草动物皱眉头恐吓邋遢的乌鸦。

sentences.english: Hermione, however, leaned against the Owlery wall, folded her arms, and frowned at Ron.
sentences.chinese: 赫敏靠在棚屋的墙上，抱着双臂，对罗恩皱起了眉头。

sentences.english: Jastrow knit his brow fiercely at his niece .
sentences.chinese: 杰斯特罗狠狠地对他侄女皱起眉头。

sentences.english: She grimaced at the sight of all the work.
sentences.chinese: 她一看到这么多的工作就皱起了眉头。

sentences.english: I caught the edge of her frown like a fishhook.
sentences.chinese: 我看见她眉头皱得像只鱼钩。

definition: to have heard what was said
outer tip of the eyebrow/(facial) expression/(Tw) knack/trick of the trade
